text: Halina Kwiatkowska (born Helena Królikiewiczówna; 25 April 1921 - 12 November 2020) was a Polish actress and educator. She was born in Bochnia, Poland. She was known for her roles as Katarzyna Staniewiczowa in Ashes and Diamonds (1958), Krzeszowska in The Doll (1968) and as Zofia in And Along Come Tourists (2007). Kwiatkowska died on 13 November 2020 in Konstancin-Jeziorna, Poland at the age of 99.Zmarła aktorka Halina Kwiatkowska ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:Polish educators
title: Halina Kwiatkowska
